casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Richard Michael HARLEY. No. 167P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 19, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Belinda J. Foster, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of April 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of April 2006."
